name: Action Pipe
description:
In this exciting game your task is to construct a pipeline.
At the beginning of the game there are the start, end and some extra segments on the board. The object of the game is get the water without break from the start to the end item.
Connect the other segments as well in order to get additional points. You can rotate and change the current item to fit into the pipeline. Collect as many points as you can in order to go to the higher levels.

Features:
Unlimited levels with increasing difficulty.
Global leaderboards and achievements on Game Center enabled devices.
Easy Mode for beginner players.
Selectable starting level.
3 different backgrounds.
No ads.
Optional tips for beginner players.
Different types of pipes: blocker, moving blocker, 50, 100 and 300 points pipes.
Bonus items to increase score and slow down the water.
Exploding, breaking, teleporting items.
Save and load games from Main Menu, autosave.
